name: ixl-frontend

scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:env && npm run postinstall:vscode && npm run cache:clean
scripts.bootstrap: lerna bootstrap --force-local --reject-cycles && node buildUtils/updatePathConfigs.js && node buildUtils/updateExampleConfigs.js
scripts.cache:clean: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf packages/apps/commerce/node_modules/.cache && rm -rf packages/apps/commerce-b2b/node_modules/.cache && rm -rf packages/apps/automotive/node_modules/.cache && rm -rf packages/apps/sample/node_modules/.cache && rm -rf packages/apps/work-management/node_modules/.cache
scripts.build:app:b2c:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce -- npm run build:csr
scripts.build:app:b2c:ssr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce -- npm run build:ssr
scripts.build:app:b2b:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce-b2b -- npm run build:csr
scripts.build:app:b2b:ssr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce-b2b -- npm run build:ssr
scripts.build:app:automotive:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-automotive -- npm run build:csr
scripts.build:app:automotive:ssr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-automotive -- npm run build:ssr
scripts.build:app:sample:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-sample -- npm run build:csr
scripts.build:app:sample:ssr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-sample -- npm run build:ssr
scripts.start:csr:b2c: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce -- npm run start:csr:b2c
scripts.start:csr:b2b: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce-b2b -- npm run start:csr
scripts.start:csr:sample: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-sample -- npm run start:csr
scripts.dev:app:demo:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-demo-app -- npm run dev:csr
scripts.dev:app:b2c:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce -- npm run dev:csr
scripts.dev:app:b2c:ssr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce -- npm run dev:ssr
scripts.dev:app:b2b:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce-b2b -- npm run dev:csr
scripts.dev:app:b2b:ssr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce-b2b -- npm run dev:ssr
scripts.dev:auto: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-automotive -- npm run dev:csr
scripts.dev:app:automotive:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-automotive -- npm run dev:csr
scripts.dev:app:automotive:ssr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-automotive -- npm run dev:ssr
scripts.dev:app:travel:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-travel -- npm run dev:csr
scripts.dev:app:shell:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-shell -- npm run dev:csr
scripts.dev:app:sample:csr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-sample -- npm run dev:csr
scripts.dev:app:sample:ssr: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-sample -- npm run dev:ssr
scripts.prod:app:b2c: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce -- npm run start:prod
scripts.prod:app:b2b: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce-b2b -- npm run dev:ssr
scripts.prod:app:sample: echo DEPRECATED && lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-sample -- npm run dev:ssr
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.build:storybook: build-storybook --output-dir storybook-dist && cp -nR static/* storybook-dist/static && cp -nR packages/apps/commerce/client/static/* storybook-dist/static && cp -nR packages/apps/automotive/client/static/* storybook-dist/static
scripts.test:e2e:ci: CONFIG_FILE=$CI_CONFIG_FILE PORT=$CI_PORT BACKEND=$CI_BACKEND lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce -- npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:hcl: CONFIG_FILE=cypress/cypress-hcl.json PORT=3200 BACKEND=hcl lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce -- npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:sap: CONFIG_FILE=cypress/cypress-sap.json PORT=3300 BACKEND=sap lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce -- npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:b2b:sap: CONFIG_FILE=cypress/cypress-sap.json PORT=3300 BACKEND=sap lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-commerce-b2b -- npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:auto: CONFIG_FILE=cypress/cypress-sap.json PORT=3300 BACKEND=sap lerna exec --scope @exo/frontend-apps-automotive -- npm run test:e2e
scripts.hooks:pre-push: node ./buildUtils/checkBranchName.js && node ./buildUtils/checkE2EChanges.js && tsc --noEmit && npm run lint
